title: Leaks? Drain clogged? Othe Plumbing issues? Plumber - handyman
posting_body: ['Please calls or Texts from 8am to 8pm ONLY.', 'Thanks', '7 days.', 'Plumber, 35 years of experience.', 'Slow drains, all about UNCLOGS, Cleaning and removing clogs in Kitchens, Showers, Bathtubs, sinks', 'LEAKS, repair any leak from pipes, faucets, valves', 'Installation of: FAUCETS, SINKS, GARBAGE DISPOSAL, NEW PIPING OR RELOCATE PIPES, WATER LINES, VALVES, TOILETS, BIDETS, SHOWER HEADS, REPLACING TUB SPOUTS, SHOWER DOORS', "TOILET REPAIR: always running, won't flush, lose from the floor, any leak, clogged.....WE FIX IT.", 'GARBAGE DISPOSAL OR INSINKERATOR: repair or replace or brand new installation', 'FAUCETS: leak repair, low pressure, water valves, flexible steel hoses, new installation of exterior faucets/hydrants/valves/garden faucets', 'SINKS: any repair, re-silicone, re-attach to the counter, new installation, also utility sinks installation', 'TANKLESS WATER HEATER: repair or replace or BRAND NEW INSTALLATION', 'Anything else, please let me know....!']
